page.title: 14CUSTOMS
page.content: There were two festivals up Twm Barlwm in 1984 people took records and food up there. There are some famous legends in this area, one of them is the Romans who lived on top of Twm Barlwm and killed the villigers.The second legend is that there was a man who tried to catch a cuckoo by putting a fence around it.He did not put a top on it,so the cuckoo flew over the top of the fence,so the people who live in Risca are called CUCKOOS. The people who live around Risca have a distinguishing accent,and it gets more distinguished as you go further up the valley. The people in Risca use common phrases such as alright,he do do and I goes to him. by Paul Jones and Eifion Williams.
